verses.text: Praise ye the \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*. Praise ye the name of the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*; praise him, O ye servants of the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*.
Ye that stand in the house of the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*, in the courts of the house of our God,
Praise the \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*; for the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*isgood: sing praises unto his name; for it ispleasant.
For the \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*hath chosen Jacob unto himself, andIsrael for his peculiar treasure.
For I know that the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*isgreat, and thatour Lord isabove all gods.
Whatsoever the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*pleased, thatdid he in heaven, and in earth, in the seas, and all deep places.
He causeth the vapours to ascend from the ends of the earth; he maketh lightnings for the rain; he bringeth the wind out of his treasuries.
Who smote the firstborn of Egypt, both of man and beast.
Whosent tokens and wonders into the midst of thee, O Egypt, upon Pharaoh, and upon all his servants.
Who smote great nations, and slew mighty kings;
Sihon king of the Amorites, and Og king of Bashan, and all the kingdoms of Canaan:
And gave their land foran heritage, an heritage unto Israel his people.
Thy name, O \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*, endurethfor ever; andthy memorial, O \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*, throughout all generations.
For the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*will judge his people, and he will repent himself concerning his servants.
The idols of the heathen aresilver and gold, the work of menâ€™s hands.
They have mouths, but they speak not; eyes have they, but they see not;
They have ears, but they hear not; neither is there anybreath in their mouths.
They that make them are like unto them: so isevery one that trusteth in them.
Bless the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*, O house of Israel: bless the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*, O house of Aaron:
Bless the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*, O house of Levi: ye that fear the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*, bless the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*.
Blessed be the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*out of Zion, which dwelleth at Jerusalem. Praise ye the \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*.
